name: Ice Station Z Physics Engine
description:
An Early Access open-world game based on Ice Station Z for 3ds. Basically, a glorified physics simulator.

Will do an Android & Linux Build Soon...

This is still in development. And was last updated on 06/03/2022 at 10:03pm EST-USA.

Version v1.3 Changelog:
- Flying Mode.
- Kept The Same Number of Giant Zombies.
- Kept the 100% Secret Dogsled.
- Kept 100% Secret Helicopter.
- Added Oil-Rig Location.
- Added 3 God-Tier ISZ Guy's.

Controls:
- WASD for Movement
- Left-Shift for Sprinting
- Left Mouse-Click for Shooting/Firing
- Numbers 0-9 for Character Changing
- Insert-Page Down for Gun Swapping.
- Press E to Activate Flying Mode.
